title: Mass conservation - time to fill a pool

content.question: A pipe with a rectangular cross-section has width <math alttext="w" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>w</mi></math> and height <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math>. Water leaves the pipe with speed <math alttext="lowercase v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> and fills a pool with volume <math alttext="uppercase V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>V</mi></math>. Which of the following expressions is equal to the time it takes the pool to be completely filled?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator uppercase V, and denominator w h lowercase v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mrow><mi>w</mi><mi>h</mi><mi>v</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator w h lowercase v, and denominator uppercase V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>w</mi><mi>h</mi><mi>v</mi></mrow><mi>V</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction 1 over w h lowercase v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>w</mi><mi>h</mi><mi>v</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator uppercase V, and denominator w h lowercase v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mrow><mi>w</mi><mi>h</mi><mi>v</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
